ygData.subject: The War of Decay
ygData.msgSnippet: I d like to see a new thread with info on the coming MAJOR events. On Lanys T Vyl, Firiona Vie has already summoned Tunare to speak with her about the future
ygData.messageBody:
I'd like to see a new thread with info on the
coming MAJOR events. On Lanys T'Vyl, Firiona Vie has
already summoned Tunare to speak with her about the
future of Norrath. Cazic-Thule's avatar arrived and
banished the Mother of All, as well as corrupting both
Equestrielle and the entire Lesser Faydark. LFay is now a
menacing place, dark and deadly. Undead sprites, the
corrupted forms of the once noble Fairy, flit through the
woods and attack any whose light offends
them.<br><br>Rugen Payne, of Ordo Ursi Prismatus, has gathered
together the individuals who have the most knowledge and
ability to command, and appointed us as generals to
gather and command armies in defense of the good aligned
cities of Norrath. I have been appointed to the defense
of Kelethin, my home city. If you are from the Lanys
Server, and wish to participate in the coming events,
please go to htpp://lanys.com/index1.htm and read the
message boards, particularly under the Tavern heading.
The First Fist of Light, a guild on Druzzil Ro (I
believe...could be Drinal) has a LOT of info on their page. We
have links to it from the General section of the
Lanys.com message boards. This is a HUGE thread, nearly 40
pages in length, with a great amount of info. It may
take you HOURS to get through it.<br><br>Norrath is to
undergo some huge changes in the coming months...I hope
you all are prepared for the War that is to
come.<br><br>Tyral Stormfang<br>Ranger<br>Commander of the Knights
of Prophecy<br>General of Kelethin<br>Lanys T'Vyl
